About.paragraph: Second self detects human emotion from an image which is one of the most challenging tasks in social communications.It will detect/ predict the mood of a person and then deal with various emotions in different ways.The more are classified as sad, exited ,happy and angry.And then it would guide them and will give them positive approach to live life.This model will have a huge user base as it satisfies the users emotional needs.

Services.name: Anxiety
Services.text: Anxiety is a normal and often healthy emotion. However, when a person regularly feels disproportionate levels of anxiety, it might become a medical disorder.

Services.name: Lonliness
Services.text: Loneliness is a universal human emotion that is both complex and unique to each individual. Because it has no single common cause, the prevention and treatment of the same.

Services.name: Depression
Services.text: Depression is a mood disorder that causes a persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest. Also called major depressive disorder or clinical depression, it affects how you feel, think and behave and can lead to a variety of emotional and physical problems.

Features.title: Chatting
Features.text: Second Self gives you the experience of talking to yourself

Features.title: Notification
Features.text: It gives you a Notification at the time of your need and comforts you.

Features.title: Recommendations
Features.text: It captures your mood and recommend you multimedia of your choice.

Features.title: Mood
Features.text: You're feeling low or high. It helps you get better and feeshen up.
